nodes.text: The Duskhan League, known as the Yevethan Protectorate, was a confederation of the Yevethan species that controlled the Farlax sector, an  independent sector located in the Core Worlds, on the periphery of the Deep Core. The emblem of the government was a double circle of three pointed stars on a scarlet background.

The Yevetha Protectorate declared its independence as the Duskhan League during the Yevethan Uprising against the Galactic Empire, the League was led for twelve years by Nil Spaar from the capital world of N'zoth. It consisted of a political federation of pure Yevethan colony worlds. By 16 ABY, the League included thirteen worlds in the Koornacht Cluster, including N'zoth, Wakiza, Zhina, Tizon, Z'fell, and Faz.

In 16 ABY, the League forcefully colonized several worlds in the Koornacht Cluster after exterminating their non-Yevetha populations. A series of political and military engagements with the New Republic military became known as the Black Fleet Crisis, culminating in the Battle of N'zoth. The world was then subjugated by the New Republic and monitored until it was razed a decade later by the Yuuzhan Vong.
